headline: A Fresh Look at Carnival (CCL) Valuation as Cruise Resumes and China Expansion Unfolds
summary: Carnival (NYSE:CCL) is making headlines on two fronts: resuming cruise operations in Jamaica after Hurricane Melissa and selling the former Costa Magica to boost its footprint in China. Both moves reveal Carnival's evolving global strategy. See our latest analysis for Carnival Corporation &. Carnival’s 2024 has been anything but calm, with hurricane disruptions and asset redeployment testing its resilience and growth plan. Even after a brief boost on reopening news, the stock’s 1-year total...
